title: Mohamed Ben Gandoubi
text: Mohamed Ben Gandoubi (born 6 May 1935) is a Tunisian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
